trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Espone i tipi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> all'automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Elemento associato a questo peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tasto di scelta rapida per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> associato a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the accelerator key.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il tasto di scelta rapida.

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key combinations for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le combinazioni di tasti di scelta rapida per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key combinations for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Combinazioni di tasti di scelta rapida per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome della classe di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> associata a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: The class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della classe di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il testo che descrive la funzionalità del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" />.

trans-unit.source: The text that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Testo che descrive la funzionalità del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name that describes the element that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome che descrive l'elemento che è associato a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.

trans-unit.source: The name that describes the element that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Il nome che descrive l'elemento che è associato a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione di valori che specifica il pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Text" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che supporta il pattern di controllo se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> è il valore <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Text" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> o <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Sends a request to activate the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Invia una richiesta per l'attivazione di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> associato con <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un’implementazione esplicita di un membro di interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Può essere utilizzato solo quando si esegue il cast dell'istanza <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer> a un'interfaccia <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider>.
